name: Checkers For Chromecast And More
description:
************     Now you can play with or without Chromecast device     ************

There are three game modes:
Game mode 1:  -  Play On A Single iDevice  -  Two players play using a single iDevice.
Game mode 2:  -  Play On Two iDevices Via Local Wifi  -  Two players play with individual iDevice via local WiFi.
Game mode 3:  -  Online Live Via Game Center  -  Two players play against each other live across Internet via Game Center.

For game mode 2, and 3 you can send text massages while game is active.
For game mode 3, you can also activate voice chat.


Have fun playing Checkers using your giant TV to share with family and friends.
